entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 3:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain mixed with snow and ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and local blowing snow in the morning and ending in the afternoon then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 40 gusting to 70 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
